technology: The study administrator mentioned having technical difficulties at 0:27, but the participant did not experience any.
cur_neg_affect: The participant does not express much negative affect in the present, but does mention that she is still wearing a mask.
past_neg_affect: The participant expresses some concern and fear for others when recalling the beginning of the pandemic.
communal_orientation: The participant asks the other participant about their experience and seems engaged in the conversation.
engagement: The participant is very engaged in the conversation and shares a lot of details about their experience.
defensiveness: The participant does not seem defensive at all.
similarity_statements: I think I really resonated with you with, you know, watching the news every day. (0:27)
vaccine_importance: The participant seems to believe that vaccines are very important.
booster_importance: The participant seems to believe that boosters are very important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrates a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and recognizing nuance.
general_notes: The participant is very articulate and shares a lot of details about their experience.
